DescriptionFormatTextId.SourceString: Text_Each time you deal damage, absorb the targets soul and gain <StrengthBase>[0] #</> for <Duration>[0] seconds</>. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
DescriptionFormatTextId.LocalizedString: Each time you deal damage, absorb the targets soul and gain <StrengthBase>[0] _</> for <Duration>[0] seconds</>. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
